verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aharon <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Havahry man <S%H376><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall pitch <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by his own standard <S%H1714><s%>, with the ensign <S%H226><s%> of their father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>: far off <S%H5048><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> shall they pitch <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And on the east side <S%H6924><s%> toward the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun shall they of the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> pitch <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8802><s%> throughout their armies <S%H6635><s%>: and Nachshon <S%H5177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Amminadab <S%H5992><s%> shall be captain <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, were threescore and fourteen <S%H7657><s%> <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And those that do pitch <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8802><s%> next unto him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>: and Nethaneel <S%H5417><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zuar <S%H6686><s%> shall be captain <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> thereof, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Then the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>: and Eliab <S%H446><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Helon <S%H2497><s%> shall be captain <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Z'vulun <S%H2074><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> thereof, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

All that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and fourscore <S%H8084><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, throughout their armies <S%H6635><s%>. These shall first <S%H7223><s%> set forth <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

On the south side <S%H8486><s%> shall be the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> according to their armies <S%H6635><s%>: and the captain <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> shall be Elizur <S%H468><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shedeur <S%H7707><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> thereof, were forty <S%H705><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And those which pitch <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of SHim`on <S%H8095><s%>: and the captain <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of SHim`on <S%H8095><s%> shall be Shelumiel <S%H8017><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zurishaddai <S%H6701><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and nine <S%H8672><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Then the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>: and the captain <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> shall be Eliyahaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel <S%H7467><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, were forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

All that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>, throughout their armies <S%H6635><s%>. And they shall set forth <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the second rank <S%H8145><s%>.

Then the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%> shall set forward <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%>: as they encamp <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, so shall they set forward <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, every man <S%H376><s%> in his place <S%H3027><s%> by their standards <S%H1714><s%>.

On the west side <S%H3220><s%> shall be the standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%> according to their armies <S%H6635><s%>: and the captain <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%> shall be Elishama <S%H476><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud <S%H5989><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, were forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And by him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>: and the captain <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> shall be Gamli'el <S%H1583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pedahzur <S%H6301><s%>.
And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Then the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>: and the captain <S%H5387><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> shall be Abidan <S%H27><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gid`oni <S%H1441><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

All that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and an hundred <S%H3967><s%>, throughout their armies <S%H6635><s%>. And they shall go forward <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the third rank <S%H7992><s%>.

The standard <S%H1714><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall be on the north side <S%H6828><s%> by their armies <S%H6635><s%>: and the captain <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> shall be Ahiezer <S%H295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammishaddai <S%H5996><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, were threescore <S%H8346><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And those that encamp <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by him shall be the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>: and the captain <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%> shall be Pagiel <S%H6295><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ocran <S%H5918><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, were forty <S%H705><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

Then the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Naftali <S%H5321><s%>: and the captain <S%H5387><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Naftali <S%H5321><s%> shall be Ahira <S%H299><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Enan <S%H5881><s%>.

And his host <S%H6635><s%>, and those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of them, were fifty <S%H2572><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

All they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the camp <S%H4264><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> were an hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>. They shall go <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%> hindmost <S%H314><s%> with their standards <S%H1714><s%>.

These are those which were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>: all those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8803><s%> of the camps <S%H4264><s%> throughout their hosts <S%H6635><s%> were six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

But the L'vi'im <S%H3881><s%> were not numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8719><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; as the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according to all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>: so they pitched <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8804><s%> by their standards <S%H1714><s%>, and so they set forward <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>, according to the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>.
